name: The Marauders
description:
As the apprentice of a workshop, you understand that you still have a lot to learn.  Despite being good at what you do, you are still very unprepared for what is about to happen today.  When they arrive you realise you have to do whatever it takes to get out of the city, you don't even dare imagine the alternative...

This game contains fairly graphic descriptions of violent scenes and actions and so those who are sensitive to such topics might want to avoid playing.

This was actually made as part of me learning to use unity so it isn't a huge game, but I am quite happy with the story.  I actually plan on revisiting the setting of this at a later date, hopefully in a more fleshed out form.
